name: Vertex, Inc.
description: Vertex, Inc. is a leading provider of cloud-based tax technology solutions, empowering businesses to manage their tax compliance and reporting needs efficiently. Founded in 1978, Vertex serves a diverse clientele across various industries, offering advanced solutions that simplify complex tax processes and ensure compliance with ever-changing tax regulations. The company’s flagship product, Vertex Cloud, provides a comprehensive suite of services, including sales and use tax, VAT, and income tax solutions. Vertex leverages cutting-edge technology, including machine learning and artificial intelligence, to enhance tax accuracy and minimize risks associated with tax compliance. With a commitment to innovation, Vertex continually updates its solutions to meet the evolving demands of the global marketplace. The company also offers consulting services, helping organizations streamline their tax operations and optimize their tax strategies. Vertex's mission is to be the most trusted provider of tax technology and services, enabling clients to focus on their core business while navigating the complexities of tax compliance seamlessly.
